changelogversion.changelogtext: Search for any Swing dancing event worldwide by city, country, continent or event name
Filter to only show events with the dance styles you're interested in
Easy access to each event's website or Facebook event
Like your favorite teacher to get immediate updates when they sign up for new events
Create your own subscriptions to get notifications when a new event is added that matches your criteria
If you like SwingPlanner please consider rating it in the Play Store to support the development and share it with your friends to help spread the love!
